name: Ghost Recoil
description:
You play as a little slime with a tophat and a... SHOTGUN? Bounce of ghosts and avoid obstacles in 15 diffrent levels!

Use A and D to move around, an LMB to launch yourself up.

DISCLAIMER: The game might be a little unplayable now due to the lack of good shotgun system (It doesn't work sometimes, so try spamming the LMB when bouncing), but it's my first game so please consider that!

A game made for the 117th Mini Jam with the theme of ghosts, that was my first jam, amazing experience, I'm looking forward to participatig in next game jams and getting better at gamedev.
